nodes.text: Microwelding was a field in manufacturing technology. Around 34 ABY, Hasadar Shu, a businessman and politician, announced that his company, Shu Industries, had made innovations in microwelding while conversing with the Corellian Engineering Corporation's Executive Records Officer Winshur Bratt and a First Order reform officer named Colonel Genial.
Microwelding was mentioned in Resistance Reborn, a 2019 novel written by Rebecca Roanhorse.
